pkgmetadata.longdescription: Portmanteau Tests for Univariate and Multivariate Time Series Models // Contains common univariate and multivariate portmanteau test statistics in time series based on the asymptotic distributions and the Monte Carlo significance tests. Simulate univariate and multivariate data from seasonal and nonseasonal time series models. See Mahdi and McLeod (2012) doi:10.1111/j.1467-9892.2011.00752.x and Mahdi and McLeod (2020) arXiv:2005.00931.
